structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

text.section: communicates a threat of death or serious bodily injury to any reasonably identified victim or victims;
notifies an appropriate law enforcement agency in the vicinity where the client or any potential victim resides;
arranges for the client to be hospitalized voluntarily; or
takes appropriate steps, within the legal scope of social work practice, to initiate proceedings for involuntary hospitalization.
